// On Boarding Page Create a budget Allocate a custom amount of money to each spending category for the month. Track your expenses Enter your spendings and capture images of your receipts. We calculate tip, too! Reach your goals faster Each month, your unspent budget will automatically be added to your virtual piggy bank. Add a savings goal and watch your piggy bank grow! Add without unlocking You can add spendings right from the lock screen. Skip Next Two people budgetting Dots Tracking expenses Back Sign Up Thank you for signing up! On Boarding Get Started!
